dc:title.@value: From Baghdad to London: Unraveling Urban Development in Europe, the Middle East, and North Africa, 800–1800

dc:creator: M. Bosker
E. Buringh
J.L. van Zanden
dc:mitpressjournals: The Review of Economics and Statistics
dcterms:bibliographicCitation: The Review of Economics and Statistics 95:4 (2013), 1418-1437

columns.name: indicator
columns.dc:description: Numeric indicator unique to each city

columns.name: city
columns.dc:description: Name of the city (sometimes containing different names used in different time periods)

columns.name: country
columns.dc:description: Country (defined on 1990 boundaries) a city is located in
columns.valueUrl: B2L:code/country/{% if country == 'UK' %}United Kingdom{% else %}{country}{% endif %}

columns.name: year
columns.dc:description: Century

columns.name: arab_peninsula
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located on the Arabian Peninsula

columns.name: latitude
columns.dc:description: Latitude-coordinate

columns.name: longitude
columns.dc:description: Longitude-coordinate

columns.name: citypop_le10
columns.dc:description: City population in 1000s, only reported when the city has at least 10,000 inhabitants

columns.name: citypop_le5
columns.dc:description: City population in 1000s, only reported when the city has at least 5,000 inhabitants

columns.name: sea
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located at sea

columns.name: river
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located at a river

columns.name: hub_3rr
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located on a crossing of at least two roman roads

columns.name: rom_road_nohub
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located on a roman road (and is not a hub)

columns.name: caravan_hub
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located on a crossing of at least two caravan routes

columns.name: caravan_nohub
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located on a caravan route (and is not a caravan hub)

columns.name: elevation_m
columns.dc:description: Elevation above sea level in meters

columns.name: rugg10
columns.dc:description: Standard deviation of the elevation of the terrain within a 10km radius in meters

columns.name: bishop
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is the seat of a bishop

columns.name: archbishop
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is the seat of an archbishop

columns.name: capital
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is a capital city

columns.name: university
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city hosts a university

columns.name: muslim
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city falls under muslim rule

columns.name: me_na
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located in the Middle East or North Africa (including Turkey)

columns.name: muslim_holy_city
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is one of the four holiest cities in Islam (Jerusalem, Damascus, Mecca or Medina)

columns.name: plundered
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating the number of times a city was plundered in the previous century

columns.name: soilquality
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating the soil quality of the fields surrounding a city

columns.name: commune
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city has a form of self-governance

columns.name: ecozones
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating in which ecozone a city is located

columns.name: free_prince_dls
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city is located in a country that is classified as “free” (=1) or “prince” (=0) according to DeLong and Shleifer (1993)s

columns.name: total_pop_country
columns.dc:description: Total population of the (1990) country the city belongs to (thousands)

columns.name: dmedina
columns.dc:description: Distance to Medina in kms

columns.name: dmecca
columns.dc:description: distance to Mecca in kms

columns.name: drome
columns.dc:description: distance to Rome in kms

columns.name: djerusalem
columns.dc:description: distance to Jerusalem in kms

columns.name: dbyzantium
columns.dc:description: distance to Byzantium (Constantinople) in kms

columns.name: d_nearest_muslim
columns.dc:description: Distance to the nearest city falling under Muslim rule

columns.name: d_nearest_christian
columns.dc:description: Distance to the nearest city falling under Christian rule

columns.name: fup
columns.dc:description: A city’s “foreign urban potential” – see our paper for its full definition

columns.name: musfup
columns.dc:description: A city’s “Muslim foreign urban potential” – see our paper for its full definition

columns.name: chrfup
columns.dc:description: A city’s “Christian foreign urban potential” – see our paper for its full definition

columns.name: musfup_devries
columns.dc:description: A city’s “Muslim foreign urban potential” taking account of differences in transportation mode following De Vries (1984) – see our paper for its full definition

columns.name: chrfup_devries
columns.dc:description: A city’s “Christian foreign urban potential” taking account of differences in transportation mode following De Vries (1984) – see our paper for its full definition

columns.name: distance_nearest_muslim_le10
columns.dc:description: Distance to the nearest city with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule

columns.name: distance_nearest_christian_le101
columns.dc:description: Distance to the nearest city with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule

columns.name: nrcities_le10_0_20
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants located within a 0 – 20km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_0_20
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants located within a 0 – 20km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_20_50
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants located within a 20 – 50km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_20_50
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants located within a 20 – 50km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_50_100
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants located within a 50 – 100km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_50_100
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants located within a 50 – 100km range (thousands)

columns.name: size_nearest_le10_mus
columns.dc:description: Population of the nearest city with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule (thousands)

columns.name: size_nearest_le10_chr
columns.dc:description: Population of the nearest city with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_0_20_mus
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule located within a 0 – 20km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_0_20_mus
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule located within a 0 – 20km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_0_20_chr
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule located within a 0 – 20km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_0_20_chr
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule located within a 0 – 20km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_20_50_mus
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule located within a 20 – 50km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_20_50_mus
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule located within a 20 – 50km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_20_50_chr
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule located within a 20 – 50km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_20_50_chr
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule located within a 20 – 50km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_50_100_mus
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule located within a 50 – 100km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_50_100_mus
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Muslim rule located within a 50 – 100km range (thousands)

columns.name: nrcities_le10_50_100_chr
columns.dc:description: Number of cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule located within a 50 – 100km range

columns.name: citypop_le10_50_100_chr
columns.dc:description: Total population of all cities with at least 10,000 inhabitants falling under Christian rule located within a 50 – 100km range (thousands)

columns.name: parl_act
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city falls under an active parliament

columns.name: madrassa01
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city hosts a madrassa

columns.name: d_largestate
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city falls under the rule of a large state (see paper for its definition)

columns.name: granadaemirate
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city falls under the Emirate of Granada

columns.name: ottoman
columns.dc:description: Dummy variable indicating whether or not a city falls under Ottoman rule

columns.name: city_safe
columns.dc:description: city identifier
